title: FTC tells search engines to clearly label advertisements
contentencoded:
In a letter today to Google, Bing and other search engines, the Federal Trade Commission warned of a need to "clearly and prominently" distinguish ads from natural search results.

Danny Sullivan, founding editor of SearchEngineland.com, joins Marketplace Tech host Ben Johnson to discuss.
itags: Marketplace Morning Report for Wednesday, June 26, 2013
